name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Security Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications and securing environments in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in **Python**, with strong capabilities in implementing security protocols aligned with ISO 27001, SOC2, and NIST standards. Proficient in leveraging **Microsoft Defender**, **Microsoft Sentinel**, and **Microsoft Purview** to enhance security posture. Experienced in utilizing **PowerShell** for automation and scripting, and possessing extensive knowledge of SIEM, EDR technologies, and security frameworks such as **MITRE ATT&CK**. Proven track record in developing cloud-native solutions on **Azure** while ensuring compliance with industry regulations. Additionally, I have a strong foundation in building AI/ML-powered platforms and have hands-on expertise in frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**, along with deploying CI/CD pipelines and microservices architectures.
